description: Manx government plans propose increasing the landing size of lobsters and crabs to protect stocks.
title: Manx fisheries: Crab and lobster landing size increase proposed
title_page: Manx fisheries: Crab and lobster landing size increase proposed - BBC News
maintext: The proposals also suggest the lifting of the moratorium on commercial lobster and crab fishing licences to boost the annual catch and making use of the licences already issued but not currently utilised.
